name: Crew
headline: Next Gen ATS/CRM for Modern Recruitment Agencies
description:
Crew is the next-gen ATS/CRM built just for recruiting agencies and independent recruiters. 

It‚Äôs all about modern sourcing, packed with cool automation and even a dash of AI. It's beautiful and well-designed. Plus, it‚Äôs deeply integrated with LinkedIn‚Äîbecause let‚Äôs be honest, that‚Äôs where we recruiters hang out most of the day. With Crew, you can forget about all that tedious copying/pasting, and tab-switching, making your workday a whole lot smoother.

founders.name: Amine Skalli, Founder
founders.description:
Founder @Crew. 
Prior to Crew I co-founded a recruiting marketplace for remote software engineers, and was a professional recruiter for 4 years.

  * **One-click sourcing with complete info.** No more manual data entry - Maintain an updated & searchable talent pool.
  * **Find verified personal emails & phone numbers** with the world's most accurate contact data.
  * **The missing piece of LinkedIn.** Bring your ATS on top of LinkedIn.


### Contact
## Get more replies with automated yet hyper-personal outreach.Getmorereplieswithautomatedyethyper-personaloutreach.
  * Send email from
![Nick](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fmemojis%2Fmemoji-24.png&w=256&q=75)Nick
Subject: $FirstName, we're hiring a Software Engineer!
After 2 days
Send connection request from
![Steve](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fmemojis%2Fmemoji-3.png&w=256&q=75)Steve
After 2 days
Send LinkedIn message from
![Steve](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fmemojis%2Fmemoji-3.png&w=256&q=75)Steve
I noticed you are currently succeeding at $CurrentCompany as a $CurrentPosition, and I was impressed by your Github projects that showcased your talent in a way that stood out. We are looking for someone with your skills and enthusiasm for our Software Engineer role.
**Send multichannel sequences** (Emails, LinkedIn Messages, InMails).
  * Ask Crew AI to generate an icebreaker
**Let AI customize the content for you.** Generate personalized content in seconds.
  * Hello $FirstName,
Going through $LastSchool, then joining $CurrentCompany as a $CurrentPosition on its incredible journey, that's a solid growth !
We're hiring a talented & passionate Software Engineer to craft the best possible tech architecture for our new wearable app.
**Stay personnal, at scale.** Add your final touch before hitting send.


### Collaborate
## Always take the right action with auto-updated & centralized data.Alwaystaketherightactionwithauto-updated&centralizeddata.
Jenny sent a LinkedIn message to Steve
Seems like it's the job & company I was looking for, thanks for reaching out. Let's do it!
@Nick, I found someone really great, you should see her ASAP. I'm sure you'll love her. I'm scheduling something for both.

### Testimonials
Why We look UP loves Crew.
## Why
We look UP
loves Crew.
‚ÄúIt's truly impressive how the team managed to integrate such a powerful tool into an easy-to-use, intuitive, and beautifully designed interface!‚Äù
![Arthur Olivier](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpartners%2Ftestimonials%2Fwelookup.jpeg&w=640&q=75)
Arthur OlivierFounder & Senior Headhunter, We look UP
‚ÄúWe love Crew! It significantly boosted our response rates through personalized sequences across multiple channels. The team‚Äôs responsiveness, and their ability to quickly develop requested features have been a huge plus as well for us. I highly recommend booking a demo and getting on board!‚Äù
![Nicolas Thieury](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpartners%2Ftestimonials%2Fignition-program.jpeg&w=640&q=75)
Nicolas ThieuryHead of Talents, Ignition Program
‚ÄúCrew is a simple yet incredibly effective tool that saves me several hours a week - as far as I know, there is no better tool for independent recruiters or small to medium-sized agencies.‚Äù
![Benjamin Watrinet](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpartners%2Ftestimonials%2Ffortynine.jpeg&w=640&q=75)
Benjamin WatrinetFounder & Tech Recruiter, Forty Nine
‚ÄúWith Crew, searching within our existing talent pool has become a simple and highly efficient process. Thanks to Crew‚Äôs robust system, everything is well-organized that we instinctively tap into our current network first. This shift allows us to quickly reconnect with past candidates and fully leverage our existing connections, turning our talent network into our greatest asset.‚Äù
![Laura \(Beritzhoff\) Hunting](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpartners%2Ftestimonials%2Ffoundby.jpeg&w=640&q=75)
Laura (Beritzhoff) HuntingDesign Executive Recruiter, Found By
‚ÄúCrew has replaced our ATS and the slew of other tools we used to source, contact, and nurture top talent. No more time wasted switching tools, I‚Äôve got everything I need in the one place. ‚Äù
![Alix Vandame](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpartners%2Ftestimonials%2Fhexa.jpeg&w=640&q=75)
Alix VandameSenior Talent Acquisition Manager, Hexa
## And that's not all...Andthat'snotall...
  * ![Responsive](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ffeatures%2Fresponsive.png&w=750&q=100)
**Work from anywhere.** Crew is fully responsive and let's you work without compromising your workflow on your phone.
  * ![Integrations](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ffeatures%2Fintegrations.png&w=750&q=100)
**Integrate with your current stack.** Crew integrates seamlessly with the most common applicant tracking systems (ATS) and all the applications you daily use for your sourcing and contacting hiring strategy.
  *     * ProjectisSoftware Engineer
    * Project statusisIn progress
    * LocationisParis, √éle-de-France
    * Years of experienceis3-5 years
    * AssigneeNicolas Thiry
    * Sourceis any of2 sources
    * Date addedis less thana month ago
    * Experienceis any of3 experiences
    * Roleis any of2 roles
    * Skillsis any of5 skills
    * Favorite
    * Sequence statusis active
    * Sequenceis any of6 sequences
    * ProjectisSoftware Engineer
    * Project statusisIn progress
    * LocationisParis, √éle-de-France
    * Years of experienceis3-5 years
    * AssigneeNicolas Thiry
    * Sourceis any of2 sources
    * Date addedis less thana month ago
    * Experienceis any of3 experiences
    * Roleis any of2 roles
    * Skillsis any of5 skills
    * Favorite
    * Sequence statusis active
    * Sequenceis any of6 sequences
**Advanced filters.** Including the extensive data coming from the 1 click sourcing.
  * ![Reminders](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ffeatures%2Freminders.png&w=750&q=100)
**Add reminders** to maintain constant connections, for Post-Interview Feedbacks or just to schedule a follow-up.
  * ![Favorites](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ffeatures%2Ffavorites.png&w=750&q=100)
**Add high potential candidates to your favorites.** Always keep an eye on your top profiles.
  * ![Templates](https://crew.work/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Ffeatures%2Ftemplates.png&w=750&q=100)
**Use your templates in direct messages and InMails.** No more copy-pasting, automatically fill the message with personalized variables.


## Questions? Answers.Questions?Answers.
### Can I customize my recruiting pipelines for each job in Crew?
### How effective is the contact finder (email/phone number)?
### I'm currently using an ATS and want to switch to Crew. How will the data migration process work?
### I already have an ATS. But I like Crew's sourcing and outreach automation features, can I integrate Crew to my ATS?
### What about Support? It's really important to me. Will I be able to get help quickly if I have an issue?
### Does the Chrome extension work for all LinkedIn plans?
### Who owns the data?
### Can I easily share talent or pipelines with my clients?
Still have questions? We offer blazing-fast support. From personalized help, to seamless migrations from your current tool(s), we've got your back. In hours, not days.
Contact us

generated_description:
### Crew: Revolutionizing Recruitment

**Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, Crew is a Paris-based startup on a mission to transform recruitment with its next-gen Applicant Tracking System (ATS) and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software. Designed specifically for recruitment agencies and independent recruiters, Crew is all about modern hiring‚Äîthink sleek design, powerful automation, and smart AI features.

**Key Features**  
- **LinkedIn Integration**: Recognizing that LinkedIn is where recruiters spend much of their time, Crew offers seamless integration with the platform to minimize tedious data entry and enhance user experience. 
- **Automation & AI**: Crew leverages automation for multiple tasks‚Äîfrom sourcing to outreach‚Äîmaking the hiring process faster and more efficient. For example, recruiters can use AI to generate personalized messages quickly and effortlessly.
- **Centralized Data**: All team members have access to a single source of truth that updates in real-time, ensuring everyone is on the same page.
- **Analytics**: Crew provides in-depth insights, helping organizations refine their strategies and make decisions backed by data.

**User Experience**  
The platform has received high praise for its intuitive design, boasting a rating of 4.8 on Product Hunt and 5 on the Chrome store. Users highlight the significant boost in response rates thanks to its personalized outreach capabilities across multiple channels.

**Team & Partnerships**  
Crew operates with a tight-knit team of six, guided by their Group Partner, Nan. They collaborate with various recruiting teams to continuously enhance the platform's functionalities based on real-world feedback.

**Community Feedback**  
Clients rave about Crew's ability to streamline their processes, effectively replacing multiple tools with one easy-to-use system. Testimonials from partners like Arthur Olivier and Benjamin Watrinet underscore the tool‚Äôs efficiency and intuitive design, stating that it saves time and improves connection with candidates.

**Current Offerings**  
- **Demo Requests**: Interested users can easily request a demo to see Crew in action.
- **Resources**: Crew provides a blog and hiring guides to support recruiters in navigating the hiring landscape.

To explore more about Crew or sign up for a demo, visit [Crew's website](https://crew.work/). 

In a world where finding and managing talent can feel overwhelming, Crew is carving out a niche that makes hiring not just manageable, but enjoyable‚Äîone impactful placement at a time.
